item.title: CNN and Softmax
item.description: body { text-align: justify} Convolutional neural network CNN is a Supervised Deep Learning used for Computer Vision. The process of Convolutional Neural Networks is: Convolution, Max Pooling, Flattening, Full Connection. Convolution At the bases of Convolution there is a filter also called Feature Detector or Kernel. We basically multiply the portion of the image by the filter and we check the matching how many 1s have in common.
